popularityCurve.label: dr simon j carmel's book is not only a great historical resource but also it illustrates many personal struggles and triumphs as well these men and women all shared two very strong common interests they are or were all deaf and they all have or had a love for the art of magic i learned much after reading each story for instance i never knew okito was deaf and that was the reason he created a silent act to music i applaud dr carmel for all the inspiration and years of effort in creating this important work
